name: Bird Panic
description:
Collect food and avoid the robots that are trying to spy on you and show you targeted advertisements.  Flap around and have fun, okay?

It's still in very early development - just a short "score attack" game.  My goal is for it to be a new take on classic single screen games like Bubble Bobble or Donkey Kong, with more interesting mechanics and/or added couch co-op features, depending on what kind of feedback I get.

If you like the graphics, I have a RedBubble shop where you can buy stickers and whatnot.

Instructions:

Keyboard Controls: A and D for Left/Right, Space to flap (up to 3 times)
X - Changes speed (point values are reduced at slower speeds)
I - toggle invincibility
F - infinite health
G - kill all players

Game controllers are also supported, with up to 4 player drop-in (though I wouldn't recommend more than 2 until there are larger levels)

Tips:
  • press flap after being hurt to recover more quickly
  • screen wraps left-to-right and top-to-bottom
  • grab the food indicated at the top of the screen to unlock better food and crowns
